text: khanditavagiyu, tam'ma balige (allahana kadeyinda) yavude pramana bandilladiddaru, allahana vacanagala visayadalli jagaladuvavara manas'sugalalli (tave mahanaremba) ahankara tumbide. Adare, avarendu adannu (mahanateyannu) sadhisalararu. Nivu allahana raksaneyannu koriri. Avanu khandita ellavannu keluvavanu hagu noduvavanagiddane
